result.title: AtCoder Regular Contest 081 / Beginner Contest 071
result.content:
Two contests AtCoder Regular Contest 081 and AtCoder Beginner Contest 071 will be held at the same time.

You can participate in whichever contest you want. (However, you can't register to both competitions.) The last two tasks in ABC are the same as the first two tasks in ARC.

Time： August 20th (Sunday), 21:00 JST

  • Duration: 100 minutes

  • Number of Tasks: 4

  • writer： semiexp

Rating： 0-2799 for ARC, 0-1199 for ABC

The point values will be

ABC: 100 — 200 — 300 — 400 ARC: 300 — 400 — 600 — 700

We are looking forward to your participation!
